thread.title: Add Traffic Driven Features to Magazine Multimedia Design with Flip PDF
thread.title_full: Add Traffic Driven Features to Magazine Multimedia Design with Flip PDF

author: prbuzz.com
title: Add Traffic Driven Features to Magazine Multimedia Design with Flip PDF
text:
FlipBuilder has launched their newest tool: Flip PDF, leading free software that allows the user to create a multimedia magazine with traffic driven features to enrich the content.
The tool bases on PDF files and documents to create a flipping multimedia magazine, integrating elements like videos into the magazine’s content.
“With Flip PDF as our latest solution, we have taken the publishing to a new level, creating the most engaging content and spreading it out through multiple channels”, said Alice Lee, head of marketing of FlipBuilder. “We have all the features to make your magazine looks stunning. You can add animations to display different objects, buttons to buy and videos to introduce the company or product, among others”, explained Lee.
While at normal magazines the content is static, Flip PDF allows the user to convert his PDF file into a flipping magazine in a short period of time. It enables designers to add multimedia features like Youtube videos, Vimeo, Sounds, Flash animations and images to make the content more interesting and engaging.
Also the magazine can be shared to global audiences through the network and can be published as a WordPress plugin.
Flip PDF has two versions: Windows and Mac. Users can download the suitable one to have a try.
For further information about FlipBuilder and other tools visit the website www.flipbuilder.com
